titles.title: ZIPPO Act
Zero Increase in Personnel for Propagandistic Outreach Act
ZIPPO Act
To freeze hiring activities at the United States Agency for Global Media, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Zero Increase in Personnel for Propagandistic Outreach Act or the ZIPPO Act
This bill prohibits certain personnel actions within the U.S. Agency for Global Media (USAGM).
Specifically, the bill requires that within the USAGM
no individual may be appointed to any position; no new position may be established; no officer or employee may be assigned any new duty; and no officer or employee may be assigned, detailed, or transferred to a new duty station.
